creator: bryan@bpgc.com
text:
OS: WinXP pro.

When a properties file is specfied and the file is a standard properties file 
(as shown in the examples), PropertyConfigurator.configure(String fileName) 
throws an excpetion. Here's the first line of the config file:

log4j.rootCategory=WARN, A1

and the first few lines of the exception:

Parse Fatal Error at line 1 column 1: The markup in the document preceding the 
root element must be well-formed.
org.xml.sax.SAXParseException: The markup in the document preceding the root 
element must be well-formed.
        at org.apache.xerces.framework.XMLParser.reportError
(XMLParser.java:1213)
        at org.apache.xerces.framework.XMLDocumentScanner.reportFatalXMLError
(XMLDocumentScanner.java:570)
        at 
org.apache.xerces.framework.XMLDocumentScanner$XMLDeclDispatcher.dispatch
(XMLDocumentScanner.java:753)
        at org.apache.xerces.framework.XMLDocumentScanner.parseSome
(XMLDocumentScanner.java:381)
<snip>
Sorry. Stupid pilot error. Everything is OK.
creator: bryan@bpgc.com
